revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix

{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = SimpleWAN Advanced |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = SimpleWAN_Advanced_(SW301DA-NA) |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = SimpleWAN |model = Advanced |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = SW301DA-NA |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = Router Firewall |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = AMD;GET40E;GET40EFSB22GV |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = X86 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L1606EM2I-12G; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = SD Card |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = SanDisk;; |flash2size = 8 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ2G83FFR-PBC; |ram1_num = 8 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth1chip = Realtek;RTL8111E; |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8111E; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:0D:B9
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = PC Engines APU BIOS;Sep 8 2014;; |stockos = FreeBSD;;;
|exp_if_types = mSATA, Mini PCIe, SATA, USB 2.0, SIM Card slot, SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = 1 |exp_minipcie_num = 2 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_sata_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port,, DE-9,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, buzzer, heatsink, metal case |addchip = Super I/O Chipset;Nuvoton;NCT5104D;;1;,,, Fusion Controller Hub;AMD;218-0792006;;1;,,, Quad 2-Input NAND Gate;ON Semi;74VHCT00A;;1;,,, CPU Power Supply Controller;O2Micro;OZ8380ALN;;1;,,, Integrated Power Supply Controller;O2Micro;OZ812;;1;,,, Step-Down PWM Controller w/PFM;Anpec;APW7199;;1;,,, 3V RS232 Transceiver;Texas Instruments;MAX3243C;;1;,,, 3A Ultra Low Dropout Linear Regulator;Anpec;APL5930;;1;,,, 3A Synchronous Buck Regulator;AlphaΩAOZ1022DI;;2;,,, Hex Inverter Buffer/Driver w/Open-Drain Input;TI;SN75LVC06A;;1;,,, 1A Dual Channel Current-Limited Power Switch;Diodes Inc;AP2172A;;2;,,, 30V Dual Asymmetric N-Channel MOSFET;AlphaΩAON7932;;6;,,, Dual Ultra High Efficiency DC/DC w/5V Regulator & Switch-Over;O2Micro;OZ8153LN;;1;,,, USB2.0 SD/MMC/MS Single-LUN Card Reader Controller;Alcor Micro;AU6465R;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = PC-Engines |manuf_model = apu.1d |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Switzerland
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[AMD]]'' G series T40E Dual-core 64bit X86 (@1GHz) *Memory: 2GB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 2MB SPI Flash, 8GB SD Card, mSATA, SATA *Network: 3x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 host port *PCI: 2x Mini PCIe *Power: 12V, 2A via barrel
==Links of Interest== [https://support.simplewan.com/portal/en/kb/articles/setting-up-your-unit SetUp Guide] * [https://www.pcengines.ch/apu1c.htm OEM Info]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery> File:SimpleWAN SD301DA-NA Top.jpeg|Board Top File:SimpleWAN SD301DA-NA Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
